name: Black Velvet
description: This 50/50 hybrid strain is a cross of The Black and Burmese Kush that yields a potent flower with both cerebral and physical effects. The flower gets its density and purple-black hue from its Black indica parent but takes on a fruity, citrus aroma thanks to the Burmese sativa. With its high THC levels, Black Velvet is optimal for intermediate to experienced patients and is favored for its well-balanced effects.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Happy, Hungry, Relaxed, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Nausea, Insomnia, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
